Name: Palma Violet Cocktail
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Ideally serve with Parma Violet sweets on the side.
Review: A floral and subtly fruity vodka sour.
History: Created in 2001 by Jamie Terrell at LAB bar in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Palma Violet Cocktail contains 227 calories
